description:
A spacious studio apartment on Broadway, UWS in a clean and well maintained building. It is a 10 minute walk to the Columbia campus. Public transit is easily accessible (1 subway and bus stop 2 blocks away). Shops, restaurants and grocery stores on the corner! Riverside and Central Park nearby.

Spacious and received a lot of sunlight. It's highlights are laundry in the building, ease of access to the subway, groceries and some amazing restaurants.

You will have access to the entire apartment and he laundry room in the basement of the building.

We will interact as much as you need. I usually keep in touch over the phone. Any suggestions or help you need, I'm glad to provide it.

Vibrant student neighborhood. Both riverside and Central Park are really close and are amazing spots for a run, or just have a picnic and relax.

The 1 subway stop and MTA bus stops are two blocks away on 110 st and Broadway.

Would really appreciate it if you treat my home as your own. No extra guests, pets or parties are allowed. No smoking of any kind inside the apartment. There is a smoke detector installed.
name: Studio Apartment near Columbia Uni
review: I love the location! It's walking distance to Columbia University and very close to the public transportation.
